data.fullContent: Leaked blueprints show that Amazon has recently filed a patent for underwater storage. The patent details a model that allows for packages to be stored submerged in water. Presumably this idea is to save space on dry land, although it's unclear if this is really an issue. More likely the company is just covering all the bases it can.
data.answer: 泄露的蓝图显示，亚马逊最近申请了一项水下存储专利。该专利详细介绍了一种允许将包装浸泡在水中储存的模型。据推测，这个想法是为了节省陆地上的空间，尽管目前还不清楚这是否真的是个问题。更有可能的是，这家公司只是在尽可能地覆盖所有的基础。
